name: Train Tracks
description:
Train Tracks is a small game made in PuzzleScript. Push train tracks around to connect the train to its caboose. You can only push them one way,  so keep that in mind!

This game was made in a Prototype course at APU, where we work with different engines to produce a game prototype once a week. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

X or Space - Start

R - Reset the current Level
